post: Louis : Kouznetsov is irrelevant to Shroud studies, he was discarded long ago, so why waste time with him? Would that it were in the past. In another thread here, it was brought out the fellow was mentioned in a paper given by Marinelli in the 2012 Conference in Valencia as a legitimate source of information. It’s amazing how long the shadow of his fraud extends..
